title: Fruits Basket
summary: A kind-hearted girl discovers a family cursed to transform into animals of the Chinese zodiac when hugged by the opposite gender.

title: Ouran High School Host Club
summary: A girl from a poor family attends a prestigious school and ends up getting involved with a host club full of charming boys.

title: Nana
summary: Two women with the same name meet and form a bond as they navigate their personal and romantic lives in Tokyo.

title: Sailor Moon
summary: A teenage girl transforms into the magical warrior Sailor Moon and must battle evil forces to protect Earth.

title: Cardcaptor Sakura
summary: A young girl discovers that she must capture magical cards to prevent a calamity after accidentally unleashing them.

title: Lovely★Complex
summary: A tall girl and a short boy develop a relationship while navigating the complexities of their differences and high school life.

title: Skip Beat!
summary: A girl seeks revenge on her ex-friend but gets involved in the entertainment industry where she unexpectedly discovers her own talent.

title: Kimi ni Todoke
summary: A shy girl who resembles a ghost is misunderstood by her classmates but begins to open up when she befriends a popular boy.

title: Maid-Sama!
summary: A strict student council president has a secret job at a maid café, which she tries to keep hidden from her classmates.

title: Say I Love You
summary: A high school girl who has been socially isolated learns to open up when she falls in love with a popular boy.
